static void mdt_fake_ma ( struct md_attr *  ma  )  [static]

Generate fake attributes for a non-existing object.

While the client was waiting for the reply, the original transaction got committed and corresponding rep-ack lock got released, then another client was able to destroy the object. But we still need to send some attributes back. So we fake them and set nlink=0, so the client will be able to detect a non-existing object and drop it from the cache immediately.

Parameters:
[out] ma attributes to fill
